actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend title V of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to require certain identifying markings on aircraft.

summary.text: Requires, under the Federal Aviation Act, that all aircraft operated within the United States be marked by number, letter, symbol, or any combination thereof, so as to be readily identifiable by persons on the ground whenever such aircraft is operated at low altitudes.

titles.title: A bill to amend title V of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to require certain identifying markings on aircraft.
